text:
Hi everyone. I want to replace  Gallery(based on slick.js) to Image slider(based on FlexSlider.js) on behalf of its predecessor. What should I do in the following example?

note: Security incident is why I try to replace it. Gallery doesn't work with jQuery 3.4.0~.
Youâ€™re going to need to add the file(s) first. This video is a walk through of slick slider but the basic process should be the same. <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3VHXu4iSSGg>
